Articles.Content:
I was making a starship recreation and i go to do my burn to get orbit and there is no thrust at all the altitude was not going up not even 1 meter and it was draining fuel and my speed was not changing. (just to say I don't know if it was because of engine clipping or not but they where barely being clipped) hopefully not or recreations will not be possible. devs please fix this 

 

.
